title: Make HunspellStemFilterFactory not modify tokens marked as keywords by KeywordMarkerFilterFactory or StemmerOverrideFilterFactory
description:
Make HunspellStemFilterFactory not modify tokens marked as keywords by KeywordMarkerFilterFactory or StemmerOverrideFilterFactory.

See PorterStemFilterFactory for example on how to handle keywordtokens.

comments.author: Simon Willnauer
comments.content: I agree we should add KeywordAttribute support to the HunspellStemFilter.
